title: Shigo No Sekai Demo Shinu Made Hataraku Hanashi
alternative_title: 死後の世界でも死ぬまで働く話 ; The Story of Work to the End of My Life in the World After Death
status: 死後の世界でも死ぬまで働く話 ; The Story of Work to the End of My Life in the World After Death
description:
Description :
        What I found when I threw myself away from a black company was neither heaven nor hell, but a white company...! A hot topic on SNS!
A woman commits suicide due to bullying and overwork at a black company. This is the first time I've ever seen this kind of story.
She just wanted to live happily ever after, but her wish comes true in the afterlife... A heartwarming and gentle story for all those who work too hard at their jobs.
Also includes a 36-page newly drawn "Welcome to the Company" section that can only be read in the book!
